item.title: Ukulele Time: Mr. Sandman - The Chordettes
item.description: Play along video for the song Mr. Sandman from the channel Ukulele Time. Artist: The Chordettes. Chords: A7, A♭7, B7, C, Cmaj7, D7, Dm7, E7, Fm6, G7.

item.title: Ukulele Time: Truly - Lionel Richie - Key of C
item.description: Play along video for the song Truly from the channel Ukulele Time. Artist: Lionel Richie. Chords: A7, Asus4, B♭7, C, C7, Dm, Dm7, DmM7, Em, Em7, F, F/G, Fmaj7, G, Gm6.

item.title: Ukulele Time: Puttin' On The Ritz - Irving Berlin & Taco
